revised_title: Ancient Zodiac Signs Discovered in Indian Pagodas
tldr: The author, John Call, shares his discovery of ancient zodiac signs found on the ceilings of Indian pagodas and choultrys. He speculates that these signs may have originated in India and were adopted by Zoroaster and Pythagoras during their travels. Call also discusses the state of arts, sciences, and civilization in India, as well as the challenges of understanding inscriptions and historical events due to the loss of the Sans-Skrit language.
